Class PHSat

  • java.lang.Object
    • PHSat

  • public class PHSat
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class with the main method for the PHSat system.
    Created by Ohlbach on 02.09.2018.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method can be called with or without arguments.
        If it is called without arguments, the input is read from System.in.
        The arguments can be:
        - help (all help-texts are printed to System.out)
        - help name (the help-text for a problem generator or a problem taskSupplier with this name is printed)
        - the name of a .cnf file (it is processed with default values)
        - the name of a parameter specification file (it contains the problem- and taskSupplier specifications.
        Parameters:
        args - for the commands

      • help

        private static void help(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method calls the help()-methods of the generators and solvers, and prints the results.
        Parameters:
        args - either empty, or [help,name] where name is the name of a generator or taskSupplier.

      • cnfFile

        private static boolean cnfFile(KVParser kvParser,
                               java.lang.String filename)
        The specification of a problem source as .cnf file is added to the kvParser
        Parameters:
        kvParser - a key-value parser
        filename - the name of a .cnf file
        Returns:
        true

      • parseInStream

        private static boolean parseInStream(KVParser kvParser)
        The method reads the specification from System.in and parses it with the kvParser. An IOException causes the system to stop.
        Parameters:
        kvParser - for parsing the specification
        Returns:
        true if the parsing succeeded

      • readDefaults

        private static void readDefaults(KVParser kvParser)
        This method reads missing parameter types, 'global' and 'taskSupplier' from a default file. The missing parameters are added to the kvParser's data.
        Parameters:
        kvParser - the parser with possibly missing 'global' and 'taskSupplier' parameters.
